name: Amazing Chambers
description:
This game was made during Klujam 2020 within 48 hours.

Content: You are a carefree little penguin that was dragged into the problems of a foolish panda that now wants to blame you for all her problems. Find your way to Bearnadette the Panda and make up your mind how you will treat her in the end.

The Team Angry Penguin

Source Code:

GitHub

We used the Open Source tool Fungus for dialog boxes. Door soundeffects used in the game: door closing and door opening
